claim: In states still employing the electric chair to execute people, the prisoner is allowed the choice of lethal injection as an alternative method.

supporting.text: In certain U.S. states like Alabama and Florida, legal statutes explicitly permit prisoners on death row to opt for lethal injection over electrocution.
